q1: Do you think Argentina will win the world cup again soon?
q2: Not without investing in developing their talent
q3: So when do you expect them to win next?
a3: when put a new manager and use all of their best players
q4: Did Argentina beat Brazil last time they played them?
a4: Argentina has always been characterized by having players of strength and hierarchy but must obtain more technical strength and skill to win in a next championship
